description: Cluster designed for tagging OSINT artifacts with relevant strategic framework information. Specifically for Block-H, these tags are related to Healthcare Cybersecurity protection from physical or environmental threats (i.e. fires or blizzards).
name: HITRUST CSF - Physical AND Environmental Protection

values.description: Security perimeters are defined and used to protect areas that contain either sensitive or critical information and information processing facilities.
values.value: OSRS HITRUST CSF Physical AND Environmental Protection: 07.a Physical Security Perimeter

values.description: Secure areas are protected by appropriate entry controls only authorized personnel are allowed access.
values.value: OSRS HITRUST CSF Physical AND Environmental Protection: 07.b Physical Entry Controls

values.description: Physical security for offices, rooms and facilities are designed and applied.
values.value: OSRS HITRUST CSF Physical AND Environmental Protection: 07.c Securing Offices, Rooms and Facilities

values.description: Physical protection against natural disasters, malicious attack or accidents are designed and applied.
values.value: OSRS HITRUST CSF Physical AND Environmental Protection: 07.d Protecting Against External and Environmental Threats

values.description: Procedures for working in secure areas are designed and applied.
values.value: OSRS HITRUST CSF Physical AND Environmental Protection: 07.e Working in Secure Areas

values.description: Access points such as delivery and loading areas and other points where unauthorized persons could enter the premises are controlled and, if possible, isolated from information processing facilities to avoid unauthorized access.
values.value: OSRS HITRUST CSF Physical AND Environmental Protection: 07.f Delivery and Loading Areas

values.description: Equipment is sited and protected to reduce the risks from environmental threats and hazards, and opportunities for unauthorized access.
values.value: OSRS HITRUST CSF Physical AND Environmental Protection: 07.g Equipment Siting and Protection

values.description: Equipment is protected from power failures and other disruptions caused by failures in supporting utilities.
values.value: OSRS HITRUST CSF Physical AND Environmental Protection: 07.h Supporting Utilities

values.description: Power and telecommunications cabling carrying data or supporting information services are protected from interception, interference or damage.
values.value: OSRS HITRUST CSF Physical AND Environmental Protection: 07.i Cabling Security

values.description: Equipment is correctly maintained its continued availability and integrity.
values.value: OSRS HITRUST CSF Physical AND Environmental Protection: 07.j Equipment Maintenance

values.description: Security is applied to off-site assets taking into account the different risks of working outside the organizationâ€™s premises.
values.value: OSRS HITRUST CSF Physical AND Environmental Protection: 07.l Security of Equipment and Assets Off-Premises

values.description: All items of equipment containing storage media are verified any sensitive data and licensed software has been removed or securely overwritten prior to disposal or re-use.
values.value: OSRS HITRUST CSF Physical AND Environmental Protection: 07.m Secure Disposal or Reuse of Equipment
OSRS HITRUST CSF Physical AND Environmental Protection: 07.n Unattended User Equipment

values.description: Clear desk  requirements for papers and removable storage media and a clear screen  requirements for information processing facilities is are adopted.
values.value: OSRS HITRUST CSF Physical AND Environmental Protection: 07.o Clear Desk and Clear Screen Requirements

values.description: Equipment, information or software is not be taken off-site without prior authorization.
values.value: OSRS HITRUST CSF Physical AND Environmental Protection: 07.k Removal of Assets
